##Question 3
###(a)
```{r}
k <- c(1:20)
X <- 2*k
print(X)
```

###(b)
```{r}
Y <- rep(0,20)
print(Y)
```

###(c)
```{r}
integrand <- function(x) sqrt(x)
for (i in 1:20) {
  if (i < 12) {
    Y[i] = 3*k[i]
  }else {
    Y[i] = integrate(integrand, lower = 0, upper = k[i])$value
  }
}
print(Y)
```
